name: Magician (itch) (LyonLin)
description:
Ever found the gameplay of mages feels way more easier than it should? Casting catastrophic magics with one simple click of a button? It is both immersion-breaking and "unrealistic". 

This game is an attempt to create an interactive spell casting gameplay.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Magician is a solo project that took approximately two weeks. The current demo contains a beginning and 1.5 stages. I created this game in my Freshmen year, in 2017.

I made the art assets, scripts, and sfx in the game. I do not take credit for the background musics, they are placeholders I took from Castlevania and Odin Sphere. 

The biggest lesson I learnt from this game is (as a programmer): Never put any effort to making the placeholder arts or they will become permanent.
